d2-50-01
d2-a0-01
rorgA54BS Telegram
func11Controller Status
type04Extended Lighting Status
submitted by PEHA | infratec


This status is an extended answer of new lighting-controllers. All modules can use this 4BS telegram to send all information about the status and errors of the module, if these data are available.
offsetsizeBit mask
Parameter 1
08

Enum

Parameter 2
88

Enum

Parameter 3
168

Enum

Service Mode
241

Enum

0Normal mode
1Service mode is activated.
(For example for maintenance)
Operating hours flag
251

Enum

0No lamp operating hours available
1Lamp operating hours available
Error state
262

Enum

0No error present
1Lamp-failure
2Internal failure
3Failure on the external periphery
LRN Bit
281

Enum

0Teach-in telegram
1Data telegram
Parameter Mode
292

Enum

08 Bit Dimmer Value and Lamp operating hours
1RGB Value
2Energy metering value
3Not used
Status
311

Enum

0Lighting off
1Lighting on
